revised_title: A Detailed Study of the Osteology of Polyodon folium
tldr: The author examines the osteology and myology of the Polyodon folium, a ganoid fish, and compares its skull structure with Teleostei, Elasmobranchs, Amphibia, and its closest living relative, the sturgeon. The study provides insights into the phylogenetic relationships of Polyodon with other fish groups and contributes to the understanding of its anatomical structure.
